metadata.title: 5240-1 -- Linux kernel vulnerability
metadata.description: William Liu and Jamie Hill-Daniel discovered that the file system context functionality in the Linux kernel contained an integer underflow vulnerability, leading to an out-of-bounds write. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo ua fix USN-5240-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  linux-buildinfo-5.13.0-27-generic-lpae - 5.13.0-27.29 linux-buildinfo-5.13.0-27-lowlatency - 5.13.0-27.29 linux-tools-common -
